# MMO Raid Healer Simulator

[![Ludum Dare 46](https://img.shields.io/badge/Ludum%20Dare-46-181717.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/mmo-raid-healer-simulator)\
[![Ludum Dare 46](https://img.shields.io/badge/Itch.io-181717.svg?logo=itch.io)](https://fydar.itch.io/raid-healer-simulator)\
[![Unity Version: 2019.3.0f6](https://img.shields.io/badge/Unity-2019.3.0f6-333333.svg?logo=unity)](https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download/archive)

An accurate simulation of the raid healer.

[![Snoot Cover](./img/cover.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wZhdUXI0Wyg)

**Ludum Dare 46**\
**Theme**: "Keep it alive"
